https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions:
This is Laurel the Adventurer! 

Press "Run" to see her walk up to the treasure and grab it.
https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.long_instructions:
This is Laurel the Adventurer! 

Press "Run" to see her walk up to the treasure and grab it.

callouts.courseA_collector_preLoops1_1: Click here to watch the code run!

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions:
Great!  Now you get to add code yourself!  

Snap a `get treasure` block to the bottom of the program and click "Run".
https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.long_instructions:
Great!  Now you get to add code yourself!  

Snap a [][0] block to the bottom of the program and click "Run"!

callouts.courseA_collector_loops1_1: Do you see some new blocks in the toolbox?  Don't worry, we will show you how to use them later in the stage.

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions: Snap two `E -->` blocks and one `get treasure` block to the bottom of the program, then click "Run".
https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.long_instructions: To grab the treasure, snap two [][0] blocks and one [][1] block to the bottom of the program and click "Run"!

callouts.courseA_collector_loops1_1: Do you see some new blocks in the toolbox?  Don't worry, we will show you how to use them later in the stage.

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions: Can you figure out how to solve this puzzle?

authored_hints.courseA_collector_preLoops4_a: To grab the treasure, snap two [][0] blocks and one [][1] block to the bottom of the program and click "Run"!

callouts.courseA_collector_loops1_1: Do you see some new blocks in the toolbox?  Don't worry, we will show you how to use them later in the stage.

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions: Get 1 of these 2 gems to solve this puzzle.

authored_hints.courseA_collector_preLoops5_a: You'll need to go two different directions to get even one gem!

callouts.courseA_collector_loops1_1: Do you see some new blocks in the toolbox?  Don't worry, we will show you how to use them later in the stage.

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions: Get both pieces of treasure to solve this puzzle.

authored_hints.courseA_collector_preLoops6_a: You will need to use two [][0] blocks to solve this puzzle.

callouts.courseA_collector_loops1_1: Do you see some new blocks in the toolbox?  Don't worry, we will show you how to use them later in the stage.

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions: Get all three piles to pass this level.
https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.long_instructions:
Get all three piles! Move Laurel to each piece of treasure, then use this block:
  [blockly block][0]

authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops2_b:
After you have moved to a square with treasure, use this block to pick it up.

[blockly block][0]

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.long_instructions: How can Laurel get all five piles of treasure using only one [blockly block][0] block?

authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops3_b: Remember, you can put more than 1 block inside a [blockly block][0] loop.

callouts.gradek_adventurer_loops2_1: This number tells you how many of these blocks you can use in this puzzle.

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions: Fix Laurel's path to get all of this treasure.

authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops4_a: To change how far Laurel goes, change the number of times that the loop runs.
authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops4_b: Don't forget that Laurel needs to walk down and collect the treasure after she finishes the [blockly block][0] loop!

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions: Use what you learned to get all of the treasure.

authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops5_a: If you can't figure out the answer right away, try using a piece of paper to figure out what arrows you will need and look for a pattern.
authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops5_b: Try splitting the problem into 2 parts, moving sideways and then down.
authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops5_c: You'll want to start with a [blockly block][0] loop that moves Laurel west and collects treasure.

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions: Add blocks to this code to get all of the treasure.

authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops6_a: Can't figure out what's wrong? Try running the code a couple of times to see what happens.
authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops6_b: The shortest solution has 2 [blockly block][0] loops, one after the other.

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions: What should you add to this code to get all of the treasure?

authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops7_a: If you can't figure out what comes next, try running the code to see where Laurel ends up.

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions: Write code to get all of this treasure.

authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops8_a: If you are having trouble figuring this puzzle out, try writing the moves down on a piece of paper and looking for a pattern.
authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops8_b: Try breaking this puzzle into 3 separate problems, and writing loops for each.
authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops8_c: Remember you can write one piece of the code at a time, then press "Run" to figure out where you need to go from there.

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions: _"Eureka!  Get as much treasure as you can!"_
https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.long_instructions:
_"Eureka!  Get as much treasure as you can!"_\
(You do not have to get it all.)

https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.short_instructions: _"Can you help me spot some bugs?"_
https://studio.code.org/s/k1hoc2017/less.long_instructions: _"Can you help me spot some bugs? I know which way I want to go, but I'm not sure how many steps to take."_

authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops_challenge1_a: Try changing the numbers in each loop if something seems wrong.
authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops_challenge1_b: You don't need to use a loop if you are only doing something one time.
authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops_challenge1_c: There are 6 gems on the right side of the cave when you start, but you only need to get treasure 5 times moving South. Do you know why?
authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops_challenge1_d:
The starting program doesn't collect the last 2 gems. Try adding this code at the very end:

[blockly block][0]

authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops_challenge2_b: You only need to use 1 block to solve this.
authored_hints.courseA_collector_loops_challenge2_a: You can move back over the path a second time before moving south.
